title: Thousands of Iran-backed fighters offer to join Hezbollah in its fight against Israel
description: Iran-backed groups in the Middle East say thousands of their fighters are offering to come to Lebanon to join with the militant Hezbollah group in its battle with Israel

title: A year ago, Russian mercenary chief Yevgeny Prigozhin challenged the Kremlin with a mutiny

title: Over 1,000 pilgrims died during this year's Hajj pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia, officials say
description: More than 1,000 people died during this year’s Hajj pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia as the faithful faced intense high temperatures at Islamic holy sites in the desert kingdom

title: As U.S.-supplied weapons show impact inside Russia, Ukrainian soldiers hope for deeper strikes
description: The U.S. let Ukraine use Western-supplied arms to targeting border regions.

title: Ukrainians in Warsaw jump over a bonfire, float braids to celebrate solstice custom away from home
description: Ukrainians in Warsaw jumped over a bonfire and floated braids to honor the vital powers of water and fire on the Vistula River bank Saturday night, as they celebrated their solstice tradition of Ivan Kupalo Night away from war-torn home

title: Yemen's Houthi rebels target ship in the Gulf of Aden as the Eisenhower aircraft carrier heads home
description: There appears to be a new escalation by Iranian-backed Houthis in their strikes.

title: It was meant to be a Christian utopia. Now this Nigerian community is helpless against rising seas
description: The coastal Nigerian community of Ayetoro has been nicknamed “Happy City,” founded decades ago as a Christian utopia

title: Coup-hit Niger was betting on a China-backed oil pipeline as a lifeline. Then the troubles began

title: With its new pact with North Korea, Russia raises the stakes with the West over Ukraine

title: Ukraine sends over 30 drones into Russia after bombing of Kharkiv leaves 3 dead and dozens injured
description: Russian authorities say more than 30 drones were shot down over the country’s western regions overnight, just hours after a Russian bomb attack on Ukraine’s second largest city of Kharkiv killed three people and left dozens in hospitals

title: Passengers told to stay away after 'major' Manchester Airport power cut
description: More than 10 outbound flights are cancelled with further disruption expected, the airport says.
